original_title: Zwei St端hle, f端r den Herren ganz rechts
overview: In 1975 the Mannheim housing complex Collini Center was build as an utopia for social coresidence. In 2020 the building and its 1200 residents have become a gated community, threatened by demolition. Social isolation, islamophobia and loss of cultural meeting places - an artistic examination of prepandemic Germany in 2020.
title: Zwei St端hle, f端r den Herren ganz rechts
